statements: DELETE FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE performance_score > 90 AND sector = 'Technology';
DELETE FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE performance_score > 9.0 AND sector = 'Technology';
DELETE FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE market_cap > 500000000 AND company_name = 'Apple Inc.';
DELETE FROM top_performing_stocks WHERE stock_symbol = 'ABC' AND performance_score < 75.0;
DELETE FROM historical_performance_data WHERE closing_price > 1000.00 AND DATE(performance_date) = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM stocks WHERE stock_id = 100 AND stock_price < 50.00;
DELETE FROM StockRanking WHERE ranking_position > 5 AND ranking_date < '2022-01-01';
